byte = 8
gigabit = 10 ** 9
bandwidth = gigabit / byte

benchmark = Benchmark(bandwidth=bandwidth, duration=3)

# file_sizes = [10 ** 7, 10 ** 6]
file_sizes = [10 ** 7, 10 ** 6, 10 ** 5]
benchmark.create_rows(file_sizes)
